text: Paolo Grossi (29 January 1933 â€“ 4 July 2022) was an Italian politician and lawyer. He was President of the Constitutional Court of Italy between 24 February 2016 and 23 February 2018. Grossi was a judge on the Court from 23 February 2009 to 23 February 2018. Grossi was born in Florence, Italy. Grossi died on 4 July 2022 in Florence, aged 89.Morto Paolo Grossi, ex presidente della Consulta ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian judges Category:Politicians from Florence
title: Paolo Grossi (judge)
